sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { XCircle, Plus, CheckCircle, Mail } from 'lucide-react'; const CustomerDetailModal = ({ customer, invoices, onClose }) => { if (!customer) return null; const getCreditStatusColor = (status) => { switch (status) { case 'excellent': return 'bg-green-100 text-green-800'; case 'good': return 'bg-blue-100 text-blue-800'; case 'watch': return 'bg-yellow-100 text-yellow-800'; case 'hold': return 'bg-red-100 text-red-800'; case 'cash_only': return 'bg-gray-100 text-gray-800'; default: return 'bg-gray-100 text-gray-800'; } }; const getInvoiceStatusColor = (status) => { switch (status) { case 'paid': return 'bg-green-100 text-green-800'; case 'outstanding': return 'bg-blue-100 text-blue-800'; case 'overdue': return 'bg-red-100 text-red-800'; case 'partial': return 'bg-yellow-100 text-yellow-800'; default: return 'bg-gray-100 text-gray-800'; } }; const customerInvoices = invoices.filter(inv => inv.customerId === customer.id); return (

Customer Details - {customer.name}

{/* Customer Info Grid */}

{customer.id}

{customer.email}

{customer.phone}

{customer.address}

{customer.customerType.replace('_', ' ')}

${customer.creditLimit.toLocaleString()}

{customer.paymentTerms} days

{customer.creditStatus.replace('_', ' ')}
{/* Financial Summary */}
Current Balance
${customer.totalOwed.toFixed(2)}
Overdue Amount
${customer.overdueAmount.toFixed(2)}
Credit Available
${(customer.creditLimit - customer.totalOwed).toFixed(2)}
Avg Payment Days
{customer.avgPaymentDays}
{/* Customer Invoices */}

Customer Invoices

{customerInvoices.map((invoice) => ( ))}
Invoice Date Due Date Amount Balance Status
{invoice.id} {invoice.date} {invoice.dueDate} ${invoice.amount.toFixed(2)} ${invoice.balance.toFixed(2)} {invoice.status}
{/* Action Buttons */}
); }; export default CustomerDetailModal;
